Text:
wiiiiiiii thanks for this mate!!
ya by the way is the video in this movie touched or is an 1:1 exact copy of the original !
you're welcome. i'm pretty sure it was a 1:1 copy.
no menu even though it says that in the description and you cant turn the subtitles off
don't know what you're using to play it, but there is indeed a menu and the ability to switch subtitles on/off.
tried on vlc first now i went back and played it on my xbox and there werent any subs but still no menu

this movie starts automatically. to access the menu just hit the menu button. i tried this in my xbox, xbox 360, and windows media player. everything is there as stated in the description. don't know what more i can tell you.
ahh that did the trick. Was it like that on the original dvd?
yes, it was the same on the original. glad i could help.
